segments.text: This scene makes me so sad seeing the potential for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, missing everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's overflowing from the sink, ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the mess, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching for a cookie seems innocent but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting a treat, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view contrasts with this indoor worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stop this before harm comes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how everyday moments can turn bad so fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes stacked nearby might get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, they don't deserve this accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
